code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import"./select.css";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Select=_ref=>{let{options,onSelect}=_ref;const[selectedOption,setSelectedOption]=useState(options.length!==0?options[0]:null);useEffect(()=>{onSelect(selectedOption);},[]);const handleSelectChange=event=>{const selectedValue=event.target.value;const selectedOption=options.find(option=>option.id===selectedValue);setSelectedOption(selectedOption);onSelect(selectedOption);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("select",{className:"custom-select",value:selectedOption?selectedOption.id:'',onChange:handleSelectChange,children:options.map(option=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:option.id,children:option.name},option.id))});};export default Select;
